messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Att: Jodye
messages.msgSnippet: Oh Jodye, Reading your post made me feel so sad for you and your lovely little girl and so mad at the doctor I wanted to hit something! (Him actually!!) My
messages.messageBody:
Oh Jodye,
Reading your post made me feel so sad for you and your lovely little girl
and so mad at the doctor I wanted to hit something! (Him actually!!) My
second baby also had shoulder dystocia and was delivered easily and smoothly
by one of the very rare empathetic doctors I have been with!
My other babies were delivered by midwives and like you, my opinion of the
Medical fraternity!! is NOT high!
Hugs to you and your family and just wanted to let you know that 1,000s of
miles away someone is really outraged on your behalf!


Namaste
Brooke
